name: C.H.A.P.S
description:
Welcome to C.H.A.P.S! 

Find your other chaps scattered across the map, by solving puzzles and using your parkour skills. Once you have gathered all your Chaps make your way to the top of the Mountain and open the final door by pressing the button on the ledge.

Try and find all the gems and trophies for a bonus reward.

Controls:

Look in the direction of movement

  • W - Move forward
  • S - Move backward
  • Q - Swap Shape
  • E - To Freeze
  • F - To swap player

Not made by us: Synty Polygon Prototype Pack, FreeSound.Org
